scripts.dev: npm run dev:up; npm run dev:down
scripts.dev:up: docker compose --env-file env/.env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up --attach server --attach client
scripts.int: npm run int:up; npm run int:down
scripts.int:up: docker compose --env-file env/.env.int -f docker/docker-compose.int.yml up --attach server --attach client
scripts.prod: npm run prod:up; npm run prod:down -v
scripts.test:ct-ci: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.ct.yml up --exit-code-from cypress --quiet-pull; docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.ct.yml down -v
scripts.test:e2e: docker compose --env-file env/.env -f docker/docker-compose.e2e.yml up -d; cd apps/client; npm run cypress:open; cd -; docker compose --env-file env/.env.ci -f docker/docker-compose.e2e.yml down -v
scripts.test:e2e-ci: docker compose --env-file env/.env.ci -f docker/docker-compose.ci.yml up --attach cypress --exit-code-from cypress --quiet-pull; docker compose --env-file env/.env.ci -f docker/docker-compose.ci.yml down -v
